newsitem.title: CHINA: China polyurethane output to hit 700,000 T in 2000.
newsitem.headline: China polyurethane output to hit 700,000 T in 2000.

text.p: China expects the output of polyurethane products to reach about 700,000 tonnes in the year 2000, the Financial News said on Wednesday.
Rapid development of the automobile, electronics, building materials, light industry, textile and machinery sectors was fuelling demand for polyurethanes, the newspaper said.
Output of polyurethane products had risen sharply over the last few years, with production hitting 445,000 tonnes in 1996 compared with 100,000 tonnes in 1989, it said.
The automobile sector was one of the largest consumers of polyurethanes, with the industry using 230,000 tonnes in 1995, it said but gave no further details.
